snippet: The pianist Garrick Ohlsson played a challenging program of Beethoven, Schubert, Chopin and the American composer Charles Tomlinson Griffes at Carnegie Hall.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by pianist Garrick Ohlsson at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: The pianist Garrick Ohlsson played a challenging program of Beethoven, Schubert, Chopin and the American composer Charles Tomlinson Griffes at Carnegie Hall.

headline.seo: Garrick Ohlsson Summons Stamina at Carnegie Hall
